sentences.cn: 他是个贪得无厌的收藏家.

sentences.en: His jealous competitors often accuse him of being too acquisitive and of taking away their business.
sentences.cn: 那些嫉妒的对手常常指责他贪得无厌的抢走他们的生意.

sentences.en: Its inhabitants , by nature acquisitive and cautious, economical, tenacious, had learnt to worship the word'smart ".
sentences.cn: 它的成员, 尽管天性贪婪,谨慎, 节俭, 坚韧, 却学会了崇拜 “ 时髦 ” 这两个字.

sentences.en: Like many acquisitive conglomerates, it experienced a rapid ascent and sharp fall.
sentences.cn: 像许多贪婪的企业集团一样, 它也经历了大起大落.

sentences.en: The most acquisitive firms tend to be engineering groups.
sentences.cn: 最贪得无厌的公司往往是工程队。

sentences.en: Until then the British ruling classes had been strong - willed, aggressive and acquisitive.
sentences.cn: 在那之前,英国统治阶级是意志坚强 、 勇往直前和富有进取心的.

sentences.en: We live in an acquisitive society.
sentences.cn: 我们活在一个贪婪的社会里。

words.tran_cn: 渴望得到的,贪婪的,自私的

trans.tran_cn: （对钱财等）渴望得到的，贪得无厌的，能够获得并保存的
trans.tran_en: wanting to have and keep a lot of possessions
